          </identifier>

            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>632e5702c1d37618352928178a06c89e8ff7146d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Jutustav, hüüd- ja küsilause, 1. klassile</string>
            <string language="en">interrogative, affirmative and exclamation sentences.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fragende, bestätigende und Ausruf 
Programmsätze.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phrases interrogatives, affirmatives et 
d'exclamation.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentenças interrogativas, affirmative e do 
exclamation.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">frasi interrogative, affermative e del 
exclamation.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερωτηματικές, καταφατικές και προτάσεις θαυμαστικών.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sentencias interrogativas, afirmativas y del 
exclamation.</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õpilase tööleht Excelis I kooliastme 1. klassile. Harjutused lause lõpumärkide kohta; erinevad lauseliigid: küsi-, jutustav- ja hüüdlause.</string>
            <string language="en">A student Excel worksheet for the 1st stage of study, form 1. Exercises about punctuation; different types of sentences: interrogative, affirmative and exclamation sentences.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">lauseõpetus</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kursteilnehmer übertreffen Bogen für das 1. Stadium 
der Studie, Formular 1. Übungen über Interpunktion; 
unterschiedliche Typen von Programmsätzen: fragende, 
bestätigende und Ausruf Programmsätze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un étudiant excellent le tableau pour la 1ère étape de 
l'étude, la forme 1. Exercices au sujet de ponctuation ; 
différents types de phrases : phrases interrogatives, 
affirmatives et d'exclamation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um estudante excel a folha para o 1o estágio do estudo, 
formulário 1. Exercícios sobre a pontuação; tipos 
diferentes de sentenças: sentenças interrogativas, affirmative
e do exclamation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un allievo eccelle il foglio di lavoro per la prima fase 
dello studio, la forma 1. Esercitazioni circa punteggiatura; 
tipi differenti di frasi: frasi interrogative, affermative
e del exclamation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα φύλλο εργασίας Excel σπουδαστών για το 1$ο 
στάδιο της μελέτης, διαμορφώνει τις ασκήσεις 1. για τη στίξη  
διαφορετικοί τύποι προτάσεων: ερωτηματικές, 
καταφατικές και προτάσεις θαυμαστικών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un estudiante sobresale la hoja de trabajo para la 1ra 
etapa del estudio, forma 1. Ejercicios sobre la puntuación; 
diversos tipos de sentencias: sentencias interrogativas, 
afirmativas y del exclamation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
